remarks: Inference forming an implication from the antecedents of two premises, where a decidable antecedent is negated.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 25-Mar-2018.)
statement:
jadc.1 $e |- ( DECID ph -> ( -. ph -> ch ) ) $.
jadc.2 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
jadc $p |- ( DECID ph -> ( ( ph -> ps ) -> ch ) ) $.
